title: A myrrour for man where in he shall see the myserable state of thys worlde
author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
publisher: By [T. Raynald for] Robert Toye dwellynge in Paules churche yarde at the sygne of the Bell,
notes: At end: finis quod Thomas Churschard.
Place of publication and Toye's name from colophon; actual printer's name supplied and publication date estimated by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
